title: Tired of getting LP Que for Riots mistakes
body: I'm tired of getting low priority que for things that are riots fault. Every now and then i will join a game & go through the whole champion select and when the timer hits 0 go straight to the re-connect screen that i can just spam click and nothing happens. Restarting the client does nothing, switching to legacy does nothing. What am i supposed to do? Get a free loss and take time out of my day and wait extra time to just PLAY a game? For something _i didnt even do_ how about your neighbor murders someone and everyone even himself knows he did it and you are charged with it. Come on riot.

replies.body:
Regardless of your intent, being absent from a match negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This happens to be a huge reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're unable to make any modifications to penalties associated with the [**Leaverbuster System**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

Based on the symptoms you've described, I'd wager that you're experiencing a poor connection to our servers. This will often happen as a result of certain network settings that conflict with League, so I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to eliminate that possibility. I recommend testing changes in a custom match to avoid further penalties.

If you experience further issues with disconnecting after taking those steps, let me know.
